thread.title: US Army reveals new smart sight system | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: US Army reveals new smart sight system | Daily Mail Online

author: Mark Prigg For Dailymail.Com
title: US Army reveals new smart sight system | Daily Mail Online
text: US Army reveals smart sight that could give EVERY soldier the aim of a supersniper System can also be adapted for use for by normal rifles in day to day warfare Combines a 6-22x magnification sight with a laser range finder Also boasts an internal environmental sensor suite to take weather into account Computer uses range, environmental and weapon orientation data to show a 'perfect' point in the sight, which operator simply points at the target Published: 20:54 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 00:24 GMT, 11 February 2017 241 shares
